DataElement.preferredName: Skin Response Date of Reference Time Point
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The date of the reference time point represented in an unambiguous date format (e.g., DD-MON-YYYY).

ReferenceDocuments.name: What was the date the [interv
ReferenceDocuments.description: What was the date the [intervention] was administered?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Case Report Form
ReferenceDocuments.description: Record date of the [intervention] administration using this format (DD-MON-YYYY).

ReferenceDocuments.name: SRRFTDTC
ReferenceDocuments.description: This does not map directly to an SDTMIG variable. For the SDTM submission dataset, concatenate all collected CDASH DATE and TIME components and populate the SDTMIG variable SRRFTDTC using the ISO 8601 format. SDTMIG Time point anchors SRTPTREF (text description) may be needed, as well as SDTMIG variables SRTPT, SRTPTNUM, SRELTM.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CDASH Implementation Notes
ReferenceDocuments.description: A complete date is expected. If the date of administration is collected on a separate CRF (e.g., VISDAT), then it should not be collected on the Skin Response CRF.
